C

calcArea(double) - Static method in class lab5.cscd210lab5methods.CSCD210Lab5Methods
The calcArea determines the area of the pentagon based on a double passed to the method
1) find the length of a side by multiplying 2 times the length times the sine (must use Math class) of math's class pi divided by 5
2) find the area of 5 times the side squared (must use Math class) divided by (4 times the tangent of math's pi divided by 5)
3) return the area
calcArea(String) - Static method in class lab5.cscd210lab5methods.CSCD210Lab5Methods
The calcArea determines the area of the pentagon based on the input value from the user
This method must call and use the other calcArea method after the string is converted to a double primitive

displayResults(double, double) - Static method in class lab5.cscd210lab5methods.CSCD210Lab5Methods
The display results method displays the length from the center to the vertex with one decimal place of precision and the are with 3 decimal places of precision.

G

generateLength(double, double) - Static method in class lab5.cscd210lab5methods.CSCD210Lab5Methods
The generate length uses the Math.random method to generate a double in the range of min to max inclusive.
